Response.Say: Welcome to Hull O D L. If you would like to book a time slot, please send a text to this number with the date as day and month in a four digit format, for example, zero six zero nine for the sixth of September. Thank you.

Welcome to Hull O D L. If you would like to book a time slot, please send a text to this number with the date as day and month in a four digit format, for example, zero six zero nine for the sixth of September. Thank you.
